summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the loading, tokenization, and preprocessing of automatic speech recognition (ASR) datasets across various configurations, including DALI audio loading, BPE and character tokenization, tarred file handling, feature‑to‑text conversion, and RTTM alignment, as well as auxiliary utilities for audio dataset handling and manifest caching.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of ASR data pipelines used in speech recognition model training and evaluation, reducing integration bugs and improving model performance reliability.
